definition: to toss about; by implication, to diffuse, winnow
kjvTranslation: cast away, compass, disperse, fan, scatter (away), spread, strew, winnow.

translations.bg: да се разхвърля; по подразбиране - да се разпръсне, да се пресее
translations.da: at kaste rundt; underforstået at sprede, udvælge
translations.el: πετάω γύρω- γύρω, με την έννοια, διαχέω, ξεσκονίζω
translations.et: ringi visata; kaudselt laiali ajada, sõeluda
translations.fr: ballotter ; par voie de conséquence, diffuser, vanner
translations.it: gettare in giro; per implicazione, diffondere, vagliare
translations.ja: 放り投げる；暗に、拡散させる、篩にかける
translations.nb: å kaste rundt; underforstått, å spre, vinne
translations.ro: a arunca în jur; implicit, a răspândi, a vântura
translations.sv: att kasta omkring; underförstått, att sprida, vinna
